General.Name: Successmore Being Public Company Limited
General.Description: Successmore Being Public Company Limited operates as a network marketing company in Thailand and internationally. The company operates through Multi-Level Marketing, Distributor Sales, and Rendering Services segments. It is involved in the research, development, manufacture, and distribution of dietary supplement, cosmetic, personal care, household, agricultural, and technological products. The company also arranges seminars; and provides render personnel services. It sells its products under the Nutrinal, S Mone', Body Cheer, Neatly Home, Growing More, and Smart Creation brands. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
